questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to rescue Sanji from a political marriage, involving a battle against the Big Mom Pirates. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face a challenge against a Warlord of the Sea known for his ability to turn people into toys. What is...?
This arc features Luffy's journey to a prison mine where he encounters a key character from his past. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, involves using the cold of the underworld to freeze opponents. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to control, produce, and become mochi. What is...?
This Devil Fruit power allows its user to manipulate and create biscuits at will. What is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is an expert sniper known for his long nose and dreams of becoming a brave warrior of the sea. Who is...?
This character, the captain of the Kid Pirates, is known for his metal manipulation powers and rivalry with Luffy. Who is...?
This character, a former member of the Roger Pirates and known for his light-light fruit powers, played a significant role in the Void Century. Who is...?
